title: Can a stuffed bird solve a 150-year-old Arctic murder mystery?
excerpt: The Polaris explorer Charles Francis Hall has long been rumoured to have been poisoned in 1872. A preserved snow bunting might be crucial evidence for the theory

title: The Elusive, Maddening Mystery of the Bell Witch - Atlas Obscura
excerpt: A classic ghost story has something to say about America—200 years ago, 100 years ago, and today.

title: The Tunguska Mystery--100 Years Later
excerpt: Finding a piece of the elusive cosmic body that devastated a Siberian forest a century ago could help save Earth in the centuries to come

title: The ghostly radio station that no one claims to run
excerpt: “MDZhB” has been broadcasting since 1982. No one knows why.

title: What Lies Beneath
excerpt: In 1708, the Spanish galleon San José sank in a deadly battle against English warships, taking with it billions in treasure. Centuries passed until a secretive archaeologist found the wreck, but now nations are again warring over who may claim the gold and glory.

title: 'He knew something': The Bay Area flight of Rangers that vanished
excerpt: The mission, still a secret to this day, was so dangerous many men bid emotional goodbyes...
